effects.2pc: Increase crit by **14%/15%/16%/18%**. This effect does not stack. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
effects.4pc: When dealing volt damage, increase final damage by 2.75% for 10 seconds, stacking up to **5/6/7/8** times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
